Parse R script headers

Source: R/headers.R
parse_header.Rd

Parse R script headers

parse_header(path = NULL, sections = .valid_header_sections, ...)

parse_header_name(header)

parse_header_all_names(header)

parse_header_timestamp(header)

parse_header_version(header)

parse_header_copyright(header)

parse_header_purpose(header)

parse_header_input_files(path, header)

parse_header_output_files(path, header)

parse_header_is_sourced(header)

Arguments

path

a file path to an R script. Defaults to the path of the source editor context.

sections

header sections to parse.

...

additional arguments passed to get_header.

header

a header from an R script.

Value

parse_header returns a list of parsed sections. Each

parse_<section> function returns the parsed section.

Contents

Developed by Nash Delcamp, Sébastien Bihorel.
